name: Add Reamaze contacts from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new contact in Reamaze. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lsVamgKcYXEA5NOYSc3rYGRtRdXRDPH7krRT0bpbWDY/edit?usp=sharing).
